entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 06 March 2023
